content:
"[< form>
< p class=""marg"">< strong>Please consider the following questions and identify 

      your level of agreement with the statement< /strong>< /p>
< ol>
< li>Strongly Disagree< /li>
< li>Disagree< /li>
< li>Nuetral/ Don't know< /li>
< li>Agree< /li>
< li>Strongly agree< /li>
< /ol>
< fieldset>
< legend>< strong>Section 1: Verification< /strong>< /legend>
< table>
< tr>
< th>< /th>
< th>1< /th>
< th>2< /th>
< th>3< /th>
< th>4< /th>
< th>5< /th>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>I and/or my colleagues know where to get information to help us 

              analyse the business case for consciously attracting people with 

              disabilities as members< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q1P1"" type=""radio"" value=""1""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q1P1"" type=""radio"" value=""2""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q1P1"" type=""radio"" value=""3""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q1P1"" type=""radio"" value=""4""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q1P1"" type=""radio"" value=""5""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>I/my colleagues have researched the scope for increasing the 

              participation of the broader community, in particular people with 

              disabilites< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q1P2"" type=""radio"" value=""1""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q1P2"" type=""radio"" value=""2""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q1P2"" type=""radio"" value=""3""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q1P2"" type=""radio"" value=""4""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q1P2"" type=""radio"" value=""5""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>I know of disability service providers that I could link with

               in the local community< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q1P3"" type=""radio"" value=""1""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q1P3"" type=""radio"" value=""2""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q1P3"" type=""radio"" value=""3""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q1P3"" type=""radio"" value=""4""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q1P3"" type=""radio"" value=""5""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>My colleagues and I make our services inclusive to provide for

              people with disabilities< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q1P4"" type=""radio"" value=""1""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q1P4"" type=""radio"" value=""2""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q1P4"" type=""radio"" value=""3""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q1P4"" type=""radio"" value=""4""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q1P4"" type=""radio"" value=""5""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< /table>
< /fieldset>
< p class=""result"" id=""radio"">< /p>
< fieldset>
< legend>< strong>Section 2: Value Proposition< /strong>< /legend>
< table>
< tr>
< th>< /th>
< th>1< /th>
< th>2< /th>
< th>3< /th>
< th>4< /th>
< th>5< /th>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>My colleagues and I have a significant contribution to make

              to the quality of life of people in our community, including people

              with disabilities< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P1"" type=""radio"" value=""1""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P1"" type=""radio"" value=""2""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P1"" type=""radio"" value=""3""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P1"" type=""radio"" value=""4""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P1"" type=""radio"" value=""5""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>My colleagues and I have the scope to improve opportunities for

              participation in fitness activities for people living in. or visiting

              our community, including people with disabilities< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P2"" type=""radio"" value=""1""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P2"" type=""radio"" value=""2""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P2"" type=""radio"" value=""3""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P2"" type=""radio"" value=""4""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P2"" type=""radio"" value=""5""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>The benefits of increasing our UniversAbility to increase participation

              are clear< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P3"" type=""radio"" value=""1""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P3"" type=""radio"" value=""2""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P3"" type=""radio"" value=""3""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P3"" type=""radio"" value=""4""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P3"" type=""radio"" value=""5""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>My colleagues and I play a major role in providing health services

              to the entire community, including people with disabilities< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P4"" type=""radio"" value=""1""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P4"" type=""radio"" value=""2""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P4"" type=""radio"" value=""3""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P4"" type=""radio"" value=""4""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P4"" type=""radio"" value=""5""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>The UniversAbility of our fitness services increases the job 

              satisfaction and turnover of my staff< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P5"" type=""radio"" value=""1""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P5"" type=""radio"" value=""2""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P5"" type=""radio"" value=""3""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P5"" type=""radio"" value=""4""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q2P5"" type=""radio"" value=""5""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< /table>
< /fieldset>
< p class=""result"" id=""radio2"">< /p>
< fieldset>
< legend>< strong>Section 3: Vision< /strong>< /legend>
< table class=""center"">
< tr>
< th>< /th>
< th>1< /th>
< th>2< /th>
< th>3< /th>
< th>4< /th>
< th>5< /th>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>My colleagues and I envision ourselves as leaders of cultural

              change< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q3P1"" type=""radio"" value=""1""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q3P1"" type=""radio"" value=""2""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q3P1"" type=""radio"" value=""3""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q3P1"" type=""radio"" value=""4""/>< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q3P1"" type=""radio"" value=""5""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< /table>
< p>< strong>Which of the following statements best describes your situation 

          within your organisation (Please select one)< /strong>< /p>
< table>
< tr>
< td>I and/or my colleagues have identified set targets for increasing the

              UniversAbility of our services and are putting strategies in place to

              achieve these goals< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q3P2"" type=""radio"" value=""5""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>I and/or my colleagues have identified scope for increasing

              the UniversAbility of our services< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q3P2"" type=""radio"" value=""4""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>I think there may be scope for making our services more inclusive

              but am not sure< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q3P2"" type=""radio"" value=""3""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>I have never considered making our services more inclusive until now< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q3P2"" type=""radio"" value=""2""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>I don't think making our services more inclusive, in particular

              for people with disabilities, is really an option for us but won't

              rule it out completely until it has been fully explored< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q3P2"" type=""radio"" value=""1""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< /table>
< /fieldset>
< p class=""result"" id=""radio3"">< /p>
< fieldset>
< legend>< strong>Section 4: Philosophy< /strong>< /legend>
< p>< strong>1. Does your organisation have stated ideals in your strategic

          plan or other management documents which relate to the UniversAbility

          of your services?< /strong>< /p>
< p>Yes < input name=""Q4P1"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

          No < input name=""Q4P1"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< p>< strong>2. Do you think an inclusive philosophy is a lived experience by:

          < /strong>< /p>
< p>a) Management? < input name=""Q4P2"" type=""checkBox"" value=""10""/>< br/>

          b) Staff? < input name=""Q4P2"" type=""checkBox"" value=""10""/>< br/>

          c) Customers? < input name=""Q4P2"" type=""checkBox"" value=""10""/>< /p>
< /fieldset>
< p class=""result"" id=""radio4"">< /p>
< fieldset>
< legend>< strong>Section 5: Policy< /strong>< /legend>
< p>< strong>1. Does your charging policy account for the varied needs of

          your customers? (e.g. No charge for personal assistants< /strong>< /p>
< p>Yes < input name=""Q5P1"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

          No < input name=""Q5P1"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< p>< strong>2. Do you track and monitor the proportion of your club members

          who experience disabilities?< /strong>< /p>
< p>Yes < input name=""Q5P2"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

          No < input name=""Q5P2"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< p>< strong>3. Have you a budget allocated to:< /strong>< /p>
< p class=""marg"">< strong>a) Increasing the UniversAbility of your services? 

          (e.g. Facilities, Equipment and Staff Training)< /strong>< /p>
< p>Yes < input name=""Q5P3"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

          No < input name=""Q5P3"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< br/>

          Not needed because equipment is already fully accessible

          < input name=""Q5P3"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>< /p>
< p class=""marg"">< strong>b) Increasing the UniversAbility of your 

          policies?< /strong>< /p>
< p>Yes < input name=""Q5P4"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

          No < input name=""Q5P4"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< p>< strong>4. Are you familiar with the national legislation that relates

          to disability service provision?< /strong>< /p>
< p>Yes < input name=""Q5P5"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

          No < input name=""Q5P5"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< /fieldset>
< p class=""result"" id=""radio5"">< /p>
< fieldset>
< legend>< strong>Section 6: Processes< /strong>< /legend>
< p>< strong>1. Do you engage with disability groups in your local community?

        < /strong>< /p>
< p>Yes < input name=""Q6P1"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

        No < input name=""Q6P1"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< p>< strong>2. Have you forged any alliance/partnership with any disability

        organisation?< /strong>< /p>
< p>Yes < input name=""Q6P2"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

        No < input name=""Q6P2"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< p>< strong>3. Have you or your staff embraced any assistive tehnologies

        (e.g. Assist-Mi App)?< /strong>< /p>
< p>Yes < input name=""Q6P3"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

        No < input name=""Q6P3"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< p>< strong>4. Have you or your colleagues undertaken any research on making

        your service more inclusive?< /strong>< /p>
< p>Yes < input name=""Q6P4"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

        No < input name=""Q6P4"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< p>< strong>5. Do you encourage your staff to engage in customer satisfaction

        conversations with different user groups?< /strong>< /p>
< p>Yes < input name=""Q6P5"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

        No < input name=""Q6P5"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< /fieldset>
< p class=""result"" id=""radio6"">< /p>
< fieldset>
< legend>< strong>Section 7: Perception< /strong>< /legend>
< p>< strong>1. Do you gather information from your users on their beliefs

        about fitness being a fundamental right for all?< /strong>< /p>
< p>Yes < input name=""Q7P1"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

        No < input name=""Q7P1"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< p>< strong>2. Do you gather information from people who do not use your 

        facility on fitness being a fundamental right for all?< /strong>< /p>
< p>Yes < input name=""Q7P2"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

        No < input name=""Q7P2"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< /fieldset>
< p class=""result"" id=""radio7"">< /p>
< fieldset>
< legend>< strong>Section 8: Programmes< /strong>< /legend>
< p>< strong>This section refers to programmes that you deliver, or support

        delivery of to conciously inclusivise your services< /strong>< /p>
< p>< strong>1. Do you and your staff provide programmes specifically for

        people with disabilities?< /strong>< /p>
< p>Yes < input name=""Q8P1"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

        No < input name=""Q8P1"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< p class=""marg"">If Yes please complete the table below< /p>
< table class=""marg"">
< tr>
< th rowspan=""2"">Disability Category< /th>
< th>YES< /th>
< /tr>
< tr>
< th>Type (Segregated or Integrated)< /th>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>Physical Disabilities< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q8P2"" type=""checkbox"" value=""10""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>Intellectual Disabilities< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q8P2"" type=""checkbox"" value=""10""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>Sensory Disabilities< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q8P2"" type=""checkbox"" value=""10""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>Mental Health Difficulties< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q8P2"" type=""checkbox"" value=""10""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< /table>
< p>< strong>2. Do people with disabilities use the gym, pool, or participate

        in group activites etc. alongside other members?< /strong>< /p>
< p>Yes < input name=""Q8P3"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

        No < input name=""Q8P3"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< p class=""marg"">If Yes please complete the table below< /p>
< table class=""marg"">
< tr>
< th rowspan=""2"">Disability Category< /th>
< th>YES< /th>
< /tr>
< tr>
< th>Type (Segregated or Integrated)< /th>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>Physical Disabilities< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q8P4"" type=""checkbox"" value=""10""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>Intellectual Disabilities< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q8P4"" type=""checkbox"" value=""10""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>Sensory Disabilities< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q8P4"" type=""checkbox"" value=""10""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>Mental Health Difficulties< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q8P4"" type=""checkbox"" value=""10""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< /table>
< /fieldset>
< p class=""result"" id=""radio8"">< /p>
< fieldset>
< legend>< strong>Section 9: People< /strong>< /legend>
< p>< strong>1. Have you or sny of your staff/volunteers had training that

        facilitates the inclusion of people with disabilities?< /strong>< /p>
< p class=""marg"">a) Operational (teaching/instructional staff)< br/> 

        Yes < input name=""Q9P1"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

        No < input name=""Q9P1"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< p class=""marg"">b) Management< br/> 

        Yes < input name=""Q9P2"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

        No < input name=""Q9P2"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< p class=""marg"">c) Front of house< br/> 

        Yes < input name=""Q9P3"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

        No < input name=""Q9P3"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< p class=""marg"">d) Stakeholders/ Contacted staff< br/> 

        Yes < input name=""Q9P4"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

        No < input name=""Q9P4"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< p>< strong>2. Are people with disabilities employed by you organisation

        and/or represented on your steering committee/ management committee/

        board of management etc.?< /strong>< /p>
< p>Yes < input name=""Q9P5"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

        No < input name=""Q9P5"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< p>< strong>3. Is there a member of staff allocated as a liason/point person

        for customers with disabilities?< /strong>< /p>
< p>Yes < input name=""Q9P6"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

        No < input name=""Q9P6"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< /fieldset>
< p class=""result"" id=""radio9"">< /p>
< fieldset>
< legend>< strong>Section 10: Physical Access/Place< /strong>< /legend>
< p>< strong>1. Have you or your colleagues carried out an audit to evaluate

        the UniversAbility of your facility?< /strong>< /p>
< p>Yes < input name=""Q10P1"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

        No < input name=""Q10P1"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< p>< strong>2. Does your facility (or the facility you use) consider the

        following disabilites when evaluating UniversAbility?< /strong>< /p>
< table class=""center"">
< tr>
< th>Disability Category< /th>
< th>YES< /th>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>Physical Disabilities< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q10P2"" type=""checkbox"" value=""10""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>Intellectual Disabilities< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q10P3"" type=""checkbox"" value=""10""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>Sensory Disabilities< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q10P4"" type=""checkbox"" value=""10""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< tr>
< td>Mental Health Difficulties< /td>
< td>< input name=""Q10P5"" type=""checkbox"" value=""10""/>< /td>
< /tr>
< /table>
< /fieldset>
< p class=""result"" id=""radio10"">< /p>
< fieldset>
< legend>< strong>Section 11: Promotion< /strong>< /legend>
< p>< strong>1. Is your promotional material inclusive of people with

        disabilities?< /strong>< /p>
< p>Yes < input name=""Q11P1"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

        No < input name=""Q11P1"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< p>< strong>2. Have you or your colleagues/staff developed any promotional

        materials with the aim of attracting people with disabilities?< /strong>< /p>
< p>Yes < input name=""Q11P2"" type=""radio"" value=""10""/>

        No < input name=""Q11P2"" type=""radio"" value=""0""/>< /p>
< /fieldset>
< p class=""result"" id=""radio11"">< /p>
< p>< input onclick=""sectionOne(), sectionTwo(), sectionThree(), sectionFour(), sectionFive(),

        sectionSix(), sectionSeven(), sectionEight(), sectionNine(), sectionTen(),

        sectionEleven(), totalScore()"" type=""button"" value=""Score""/>
< input class=""marg1"" onclick=""removeText()"" type=""reset"" value=""Reset""/>< /p>
< h3>Overall Comment on your organisation: < /h3>
< p class=""result"" id=""overallResults"">< /p>
< /form>]",2019-01-29 12:42:32.898087
label: Form

content:
"[< body class=""uimobileviewport"">
< !--Start of login/home page-->
< div data-role=""page"" data-theme=""a"" id=""home"">
< div data-role=""header"" data-theme=""b"">
< h1>Restaurant Info< /h1>
< /div>< !--header-->
< div class=""login"" data-role=""content"">
< ul data-inset=""true"" data-role=""listview"">
< div id=""login"">
< a data-role=""button"" data-transition=""slide"" id=""open"">
							Login
						< /a>
< form>
< p>
< label for=""username"">Username:< /label>
< input id=""username"" name=""username"" type=""text""/>
< /p>
< p>
< label for=""password"">Password: < /label>
< input id=""password"" name=""password"" type=""text""/>
< /p>
< p>
< input href=""#menu"" id=""button"" name=""button"" type=""submit"" value=""Submit""/>
< /p>
< /form>
< /div>
< /ul>
< br/>
< br/>
< ul data-inset=""true"" data-role=""listview"">
< li>
< a data-role=""button"" data-transition=""slide"" href=""#menu"" id=""guest"" style=""text-align: center"">Guest< /a>
< /li>
< /ul>
< /div>< !--End Content-->
< /div>< !--End home page -->
< !--Start of menu page-->
< div data-role=""page"" data-theme=""a"" id=""menu"">
< div data-role=""header"" data-theme=""b"">
< h1>Menu< /h1>
< /div>< !--header-->
< div data-role=""content"">
< ul data-inset=""true"" data-role=""listview"">
< li>
< a data-transition=""slide"" href=""#search"">Custom Search< /a>< !-- use google custom search api-->
< /li>
< li>
< a data-transition=""slide"" href=""#location"">Search Nearby< /a>< !--use google maps-->
< /li>
< li>
< a data-transition=""slide"" href=""#facebook"">Facebook< /a>< !--use facebook api-->
< /li>
< li>
< a data-transition=""slide"" href=""#fourSquare"">Four Square< /a>< !--use trip advisor api-->
< /li>
< /ul>
< /div>< !--/content-->
< div data-id=""myfooter"" data-position=""fixed"" data-role=""footer"">
< div class=""controls"" data-role=""controlgroup"" data-type=""horizontal"">
< a data-icon=""home"" data-role=""button"" href=""#home"">Log Out< /a>
< a data-icon=""bars"" data-role=""button"" href=""#menu"">Main Menu< /a>
< a data-icon=""search"" data-role=""button"" href=""#search"">Search< /a>
< /div>
< /div>
< !--/footer-->
< /div>< !--/page-->
< !--Start of custom search page -->
< div data-role=""page"" data-theme=""a"" id=""search"">
< div data-role=""header"" data-theme=""b"">
< h1>Custom Search< /h1>
< /div>< !--/header -->
< div data-role=""content"">
< h2>Search for Restaurants< /h2>
< !--< p>< gcse:search>< /gcse:search>< /p>-->
< div class=""sidebar"">
< gcse:searchbox enableautocomplete=""true"">< /gcse:searchbox>
< /div>
< br/>
< div class=""main-content"">
< gcse:searchresults>< /gcse:searchresults>
< /div>
< p>
< a data-rel=""back"" data-role=""button"" href=""#menu"" style=""width:15%"">Back< /a>
< /p>
< /div>< !--/content-->
< div data-id=""myfooter"" data-position=""fixed"" data-role=""footer"">
< div class=""controls"" data-role=""controlgroup"" data-type=""horizontal"">
< a data-icon=""home"" data-role=""button"" href=""#home"">Log Out< /a>
< a data-icon=""bars"" data-role=""button"" href=""#menu"">Main Menu< /a>
< a data-icon=""search"" data-role=""button"" href=""#search"">Search< /a>
< /div>
< /div>< !--/footer-->
< /div>< !--/page-->
< !--Start of search location page -->
< div data-role=""page"" data-theme=""a"" id=""location"">
< div data-role=""header"" data-theme=""b"">
< h1>Search Nearby< /h1>
< /div>
< div data-role=""content"" style=""height:100%; width:98%; position:absolute;"">
< div id=""map"">< /div>
< p>
< a data-rel=""back"" data-role=""button"" href=""#menu"" style=""width:15%"">Back< /a>
< /p>
< /div>< !--content-->
< div data-id=""myfooter"" data-position=""fixed"" data-role=""footer"">
< div class=""controls"" data-role=""controlgroup"" data-type=""horizontal"">
< a data-icon=""home"" data-role=""button"" href=""#home"">Log Out< /a>
< a data-icon=""bars"" data-role=""button"" href=""#menu"">Main Menu< /a>
< a data-icon=""search"" data-role=""button"" href=""#search"">Search< /a>
< /div>
< /div>< !--/footer -->
< /div>< !--/page -->
< !--Start of facebook page -->
< div data-role=""page"" data-theme=""a"" id=""facebook"">
< div data-role=""header"" data-theme=""b"">
< h1>Facebook< /h1>
< /div>< !--/header -->
< div data-role=""content"" style=""height:100%; width:98%; position:absolute;"">
< h3>Popular Restaurants in Tralee< /h3>

< !--Start of JS-->

					var url = 'https://api.foursquare.com/v2/venues/explore?near=""Tralee""&oauth_token=QIKN10JEXZTJUARZKHIZUWHYIVT5EEJN54MLT0K1RCLJNRRT&v=20131016'

									if ($("".js-example-data-array :selected"").text() == ""The Roast House"") {

										$(""#more"").html(""< p>Rating: "" + data.response.groups[0].items[20].venue.rating + ""< /p>"" +

														""< p>Hours: "" + data.response.groups[0].items[22].venue.hours.status + ""< /p>"");
									}
									else if ($("".js-example-data-array :selected"").text() == ""Turner's Lounge"") {
